name: Coming to Grips with Christine
description: Coming to Grips with Christine is a story-based adventure game with a number of highly erotic sex scenes. Adrian's girlfriend, Christine, is definitely the alpha in their relationship, but she makes up for it by providing him with a highly rewarding sex life. Adrian must decide whether to stay with her or go looking for someone he can be on a more even footing with. You play as Adrian and can follow three main paths, each with good, mediocre, and bad endings. Along the way, you'll meet an alternative to Christine who wouldn't be as adventurous in bed, but who would treat you better outside of the bedroom. Which way you go is up to you, and there are satisfying endings with either choice. There are 3 main endings spanning a variety of outcomes for Adrian. There are 9 explicit sex scenes. There are 7 achievements and a bonus scene for getting all of them. And there are over 800 fully rendered images with complex backgrounds and extremely attractive characters. This is an adult game which is not appropriate for minors nor for playing while at work.
